name: Corewars
overview:
This is a RISC OS version of the classic 'computer virus' game/simulation, popular in the 1980's. Originally inspired by an article telling about the game called Core War, where hostile programs engage in a battle of bits.

It is a programming game in which two programs run in a simulated computer with the goal of terminating opponent. Once the game is started the player watch the code overwriting all the memory.
